en_garde.midnightconfig.title: En Garde! Config
en_garde.midnightconfig.parryWindow.tool: The window of time to parry an attack in ticks.
en_garde.midnightconfig.parryKnockback.t: The amount of knockback applied when an attack is parried.
en_garde.midnightconfig.blockDamageMulti: The value damage is multiplied by when blocked. 1 = 100%, 0.5 = 50%, etc.
